mapper.insert: insert into task(project_id, classification, title, detail, start_date, end_date, task_status, created_at, modified_at) values (#{projectId}, #{task.classification}, #{task.title}, #{task.detail}, #{task.startDate}, #{task.endDate}, #{task.taskStatus}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update task set classification=#{classification}, title=#{title}, detail=#{detail}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, modified_at=now() where task_id=#{taskId} and is_deleted is null
mapper.select:
select count(*) from task
